articles.title: RFK Jr.'s vow to overhaul vaccine injury program echoes grievances of anti-vaccine movement - AP News
articles.description: Health Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr. says he wants to rework the U.S. program for compensating Americans injured by vaccines. The plan has long been a target of anti-vaccine groups and changing it could have far-reaching consequences for vaccine availibilit…
articles.content: WASHINGTON (AP) Health Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr. is vowing to fix the federal program for compensating Americans injured by vaccines, opening the door to sweeping changes for a system long targ… [+7250 chars]
